SignatureStandard Struct Reference

Base class for public key signature standard classes. These classes are used to select from variants of algorithms. Note that not all standards apply to all algorithms. More...

#include <pubkey.h>

Inheritance diagram for SignatureStandard:

Detailed Description

Base class for public key signature standard classes. These classes are used to select from variants of algorithms. Note that not all standards apply to all algorithms.
